meanings.definition: A person who advocates or practices simplicity.
meanings.sent1: The simplist always chooses the easiest path to solve problems.
meanings.sent2: She is known as a simplist because she believes in living with less.
meanings.sent3: The simplist decided to declutter his entire house in one day.
meanings.sent4: Being a simplist is like having a superpower in a world full of complexities.
meanings.sent5: The simplist's motto is 'less is more.'

meanings.definition: Characterized by simplicity; easy to understand or use.
meanings.sent1: The instructions were written in the simplist language possible.
meanings.sent2: The simplist solution to the problem was to just turn it off and on again.
meanings.sent3: She wore the simplist outfit to the fancy party and stood out in a good way.
meanings.sent4: The simplist design of the building made it blend beautifully with the surroundings.
meanings.sent5: His speech was so simplist that even a child could understand.
